General.Name: Hundsun Technologies Inc
General.Description: Hundsun Technologies Inc. operates as a financial technology company in the People's Republic of China. The company operates through six segments: Big retail IT, Big asset management IT, Banking and industrial IT, Data risk and infrastructure IT, Internet innovation, and non-financial. Its Big retail IT business segment provides centralized trading systems to provide account management, capital clearing and settlement, commission order management, and access services; registration and transfer, asset allocation, product management; and wealth management, sales, and marketing systems. The Big asset management IT business segment offers investment decision-making, investment trading management, valuation and accounting, and asset management operation systems, as well as institutional service-related business systems. Its Data risk and infrastructure IT business segment provides compliance management products. The Banking and industrial IT business segment offers cash management platforms, and bill business products. The Internet innovation segment offers cloud service solutions, as well as IaaS+PaaS+SaaS layer cloud computing services. The company mainly serves securities, futures, public offerings, trusts, insurance, private equity, banking, industry, stock exchanges, and emerging industries sectors. Hundsun Technologies Inc. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, the People's Republic of China.
